bug_report.summary: Clicking the 'Go to Catalog' button on the home page does not redirect to the Catalog page
bug_report.environmet: OS: Windows 8 x64 Browser: Google Chrome v97.0.4864.47 x64 Catalog Button 10.1.2 Critical High 1. Go to the main page of the site (link_to_website) Click the catalog button</ Clicking the Catalog button does NOT redirect to the Catalog page Clicking the Catalog button redirects to the Catalog page link_to_picture_or_video_with_bug
